New Records: Sese Bau scored his maiden T20 World Cup 50
Roston Chase took 2 wickets for 14 runs
Key Match Events: Roston Chase's rescue act helped West Indies recover from scare to defeat Papua New Guinea by 5 wickets
Sese Bau top scored for Papua New Guinea with a steady 50
West Indies bowlers rattled PNG early, sending back 2 batters for just 10
Rovman Powell won the toss and West Indies will bowl first against Papua New Guinea
Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell: We are going to bowl first. It is a fresh wicket, we will hope to restrict them and then our batters can chase it down.
Assad Vala: It looks like a good wicket even though there's been rain around for the last two days. We have the right balance at the moment with a lot of all rounders.
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase's rescue act helped West Indies recover from scare to defeat Papua New Guinea by 5 wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Providence Stadium in Guyana on Sunday
The West Indies vs Papua New Guinea match was part of the ICC T20 World Cup 2024
